data.text: Mkulu Nguluwi nakandajila kahi kulota. Nambona chikowe chimemile mafuza ga chipalangule.

Naye Mkulu Nguluwi nakambuza, “Amosi, kwangona choni?” Heni nandimwidichila, “Ndanguchona chikowe cha mafuza ga chipalangule.” Hamba Mkulu Nguluwi nakandonjela, “Kuduma nakuwafichila wanhu wa heni wa Isilaeli. Sikwimilila kahi wihe wa hewo.”
Mkulu Nguluwi kangulonga, “Kuli zuwa alyo, nzimbo za ng'handa ya Nguluwi zowa ndo kulombocheza.
na kuguza miwewezi jiwele hamwe na ngano.
Mkulu Nguluwi, Nguluwi wa Isilaeli, nakelaha,
Ahyo, isi yokakama na chila munhu kuli isi kolombocheza.
Mnvina za hemwe ndozidita kuwa chililo,
Mhela wanguya uwele ndoigala nzala kuli isi.
Wanhu wolubaluba kulawa bahali mbaka bahali,
Zuwa alyo, mbaka wasongolo na wahinza wawele na mong'ho,
Wala walingilaha kwa mlungu wa Samaliya,
